description: '''Robert Lee''' "'''Smokey'''" '''Wilson''' (July 11, 1936 â€“ September 8, 2015) was an American [[West Coast blues]] [[guitarist]]. He spent most of his career performing West Coast blues and [[juke joint blues]] in [[Los Angeles]], [[California]]. He recorded a number of [[album]]s for [[record label]]s such as [[P-Vine Records]], Bullseye Blues and Texmuse Records. His career got off to a late start, with international recognition eluding him until the 1990s.
